alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:05AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 feet, highest amounts above 3000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could cause white-out conditions at times and bring down tree branches, leading to power outages. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
